website_summaries.verdict: A five-tool kit that lives up to the DEWALT reputation for heavy-duty build and power. From the professional to the do-it-yourselfer, tool enthusiasts won't find a better set.
pros: Rugged tools that are built to perform
Hammer drill, LED flashlight, impact driver, circular and reciprocating saws
The set's 20-volt lithium ion batteries earn praise for fast charging and long runtimes, and you get two with the charger
cons: Circular saw doesn't come with a fence
It's a pricey option, but it's also the best

website_summaries.verdict: The best, most comprehensive drill kit you will find on the market today. If you are serious about DEWALT tools, this is the kit to get.
pros: A comprehensive DEWALT tool kit that incorporates all of the top tools you will need in your arsenal
cons: It falls on the higher end of the price spectrum, but it's completely within reason for what you are getting

customer_reviews.title: Impact Driver seized on fourth use
customer_reviews.text: Two stars overall for the set. Zero for the impact driver. Bottom line- about 1 hour of total usage in four separate periods over several days resulted in seized driver motor. The video is of the second use when there was a bit of smoke after about 15 minutes of usage and I happened to have my phone. Left it alone for a couple days then used it two more times for about 20 minutes each with no issue. On fourth usage, suddenly became very hot after 10 minutes of intermittent use and smoked much more than in the video. The tool is now seized and no longer functions.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: These tools are powerful and really do exactly as I want. I am new to cordless circular saws, but am now a believer! The reciprocating saw locks up tight and makes nice cuts. Work light, I mean it is there to make it a 5 tool combo not a 4. It does work and is bright, but not as bright as a $15 LED flashlight... Batteries hold up well, I like that I can upgrade to higher amp-hour batteries down the road.
customer_reviews.author: KayakFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Husband for xmas. He was very happy . Comes with everything blade for the hand saw , warranty books for each item and I saved probably 300.00 or more buying in a group like this . The carry bag is really nice quality too. Comes with 2 batteries as well and each power tool has a lil light so you can see what you are doing. My husband has always used this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 Years And Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Dewalt set about 8 years ago in mid 2012. I'm a do-it-yourself-er and only used this kit around the home and garage, so it actually hasn't been use commercially or on the job site. However, the quality of all of the tools has held up, and the batteries actually do still hold a charge, albeit a bit less than when they were new. All in all, who can complain after 8 years? I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Never Disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel like a true professional but are a DIY’er then this set is for you! It comes with every tool you’ll need to get started on all those projects you’ve been putting off. Just remember, even though you’re now feeling like you can tackle the entire home improvement world, try not to overestimate your own capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Proud of my Dewalt Tools
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a Dewalt power set. Love this addition to my garage. It’ll be so useful as a new homeowner to have good reliable tools. I’m already thinking about home improvements I can use my new tools for. I think this set is a bargain for what you’re receiving and gets a bulk of the power tools you need crossed off the list. I’d recommend getting the combo with the jigsaw as well. Tools are made well and feel excellent in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this set of tools! He's been using them for re-modeling a fixer-upper house we bought, and he can't say enough good things about them -- mostly that the battery lasts and lasts! And he loves the free-standing, point-anywhere bright light! He can't imagine how he got along without this tool set until now!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the tools generally, although the flashlight is not a must have. My only complaint thus far is the fact that I had to buy the 1/8, 3/8 and 1/2" socket adapters for the impact driver. It set me back around $6. Come on DeWalt, $6 really!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good set of tools for what I need to do
customer_reviews.text: Love that the batteries work on any tool and these are high capacity batteries so they should hold up for longer jobs. Also compatible with my older Dewalt tools. Dewalt makes a good product in my opinion and this package represents a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom First

customer_reviews.title: Scam Combo
customer_reviews.text: The combo is supposed to be complete brushless. Upon opening, only some of the tools are brushless. It's a fraudulent way to do business. We'll be using a different manufacturer next time since what comes in the box is not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt is a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt has another winner with this lithium battery line up! We have always used DeWalt products in the shop, when this went on sale we picked up another set and we are not disappointed! The right tools for the right job!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very good power tools
customer_reviews.text: Very good power tools. I have been using DEWALT for at least 10+ years. The new drivers are small but powerful. The only bad power tool in my opinion is the reciprocating saw. At least 2 have been broken on me (snapped in 2 pieces) and 1's inner parts broke. Still 5 stars because their other tools are great.
customer_reviews.author: Manni

customer_reviews.title: All failed after first few uses
customer_reviews.text: These tools are garbage. Every single one I've used has stopped working after only a few uses. The light was the first to go. After a few uses, it would power up for a second before cutting out, every time it was turned on. DeWalt sent me a replacement, which had the same issue. Now the drill has stopped working as well. I haven't used the others enough, but I'm sure they're not far behind. I don't know if these are refurbished, fake, or just a bad product, but I highly recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This basically covers all my needs, since I'm not a super handy person. The only reason I docked a star was because my impact driver had a slight crack in the casing. It hasn't impacted (no pun intended) performance, but is annoying to see.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Dang

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this anywhere else until you do a comparison!
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw a similar set at the local hardware store, and when he called to tell me he was about to purchase it, I asked him to hold on for a second. I looked up a similar set (only even better) here on Amazon. This deal was a lot larger and significantly cheaper. He really loves the entire set. The tote bag is well-made and just the right size, and the flashlight is incredible! And rechargeable! Huzzah!
customer_reviews.author: Eve StarrTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality took kit
customer_reviews.text: Greatest tool kit I've ever owned. Everything is super high quality, and the drill can easily drill 6 4 inch holes thru yellow pine in one charge, which is impressive alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the tool bag is very convenient. Having the pieces all together and being interchangeable with the batteries makes working on projects with various needs easy.
customer_reviews.author: BatMom

customer_reviews.title: Love the battery life button that lets you know how ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any handy man. I've definitely gotten my money's worth. Love the battery life button that lets you know how much charge you have left, good thing to know before you start a project.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I purchased these just for use around the home, I certainly challenge their quality, strength and durability! Thatbsaid, it was between this set and a comparable Milwaukee set, and even though i would assume the Milwaukee are great, I am 100% confident that I made the right choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the build quality and reliability I have with these dewalt tools this is an awesome tool set, I love the bag it comes in but I was not very happy to see there was a tear in the side of the bag upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: No problems. All tools work as they should.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works the way it should. The bag is nice and big and fits all the tools. My only complaint is that there is only one belt clip included for the drills/flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Now I feel like a real man
customer_reviews.text: These tools have so much power behind them, I feel like a man and not some little baby man with my black and decker drill toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Christmas present DEWALT DCK590L2 20-Volt MAX ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present DEWALT DCK590L2 20-Volt MAX Li-Ion 3.0 Ah 5-Tool Combo Kit and one battery will not charge. Working with Dewalt to see if they will replace. I will update. Update 3/30 Dewalt sent a new battery to replace the defective one, its working great. This is a great kit and all the tools and batteries now work GREAT,.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He has started a couple projects already, and says he wished he would have had this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Thought dewalt was the best out there
customer_reviews.text: I spend almost $500 on tools and my reciprocating tool insert doesn't work, how do I ship all of this back, this is crazy
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: This is a truly great buy. Great products
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly great buy. Great products. I am glad I spent the extra money to have quality products. Dewalt lasts longer and has more power than a lot of the others. Little things, like the lights and the belt clip for the screw guns are excellent and quality touches as well.
customer_reviews.author: ITGuru

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this and the price was fantastic compared to other sets of equal tools. VERY good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery and very good packaging.thanks amazon
customer_reviews.text: love dewalt tools and I think im going to really love this set,as I just received it.i owned an eighteen volt set before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price for such well crafted tools was too good to pass up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item fory husband for christmas. I'm getting a finished basement and a new bathroom! They haven't faltered through the renevation, and the 20 volt interchangeable batteries never leave you waiting for a charge. The price for such well crafted tools was too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the kit. I have had a chance to use each tool, and I can see that this will do the job that I need it to do. The sawzall is a little rougher and louder than I thought it might be, but it works for what I need it to do. I would buy this kit again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Do it all with these tools
customer_reviews.text: i bought this set to replace the power tools that were ruined when Hurricane Sandy came to my town and put them right to work rebuilding what she destroyed. The batteries charge quickly and hold their charge well. The 20-Volt power is noticeable right away and makes powering through the toughest job a piece of cake. I'm basically unskilled labor helping my father in law but these tools make even me look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made in a long time. Dewalt is known for their quality. However, I have been hesitant to use battery operated tools. These are strong tools. The battery lasts a long time. The tools are strong. The battery recharges in a fair amount of time. The price that I purchased was amazing. Super value
customer_reviews.author: Suzette B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for these good tools!
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt is the best!! IMO. These are no exception. They hold up good, last long, make a tough job easier.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Get this kit now you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a house? Remodeling the house? you a handyman? This is the set that you need. It has everything you need to drill, Saw , impact driver, a charger and a bag. Get this kit now you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NapaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Love Dewalt and always have
customer_reviews.text: Love Dewalt and always have. Tools work great and the flashlight unexpectedly came in handy one day! Gave it a four just cause the circular eats up the battery way to fast. Other than that can't complain, all works just like the set I bought for work just like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cam C

customer_reviews.title: very useful tool set
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this set is useful! I am impressed how long the batteries last before I need to charge them.
customer_reviews.author: lovebluesky

customer_reviews.title: dewalt did this right
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive set. I have had many combo packs over the years and this one is by far the best. I do laminate flooring and tile work as a second job, so I really put my tools through the ringer. The power of this set is comparable to high quality plug in tools and the battery life is excellent. I screwed in the pickets on a 100 ft fence without needing a charge. I plan on adding more tools from this line to my collection. If you get a set like this. Make sure they are the 3amp hour battery like these.
customer_reviews.author: chad jefferis

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit
customer_reviews.text: Good power and tool design. Batteries seem to last a long time. Tool bag is cheap thin material but the tools seem good.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M SOARES

customer_reviews.title: Great tools.
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this set I have become so much more productive. I have all the tools at hand. The 3 amp hour batteries have been holding charges steady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for hubby. He was excited and loves all of them
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Two Tools are Missing
customer_reviews.text: Mine is missing the Impact Driver and the Hammer Drill. It says a set of 5 tools but got only 3.
customer_reviews.author: leo p.

customer_reviews.title: The gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas last year. I'm very happy with it. Got the 3 speed drill, which you don't find in other combos.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: all good - great product - great seller
customer_reviews.text: all good - great product - great seller | delivered promptly, exactly as promised
customer_reviews.author: hnh

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The item was missing pieces when we received it. For the price, I would think everything would be there. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VVUHSD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this so far. The driver is amazing and battery life is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Elexia Green

customer_reviews.title: 18v just won’t cut it anymore
customer_reviews.text: After the 20v I just can’t Bear to use my old stuff. The impact driver esp is very light. And powerful. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: osborntownroad

customer_reviews.title: There is not a better brand out there than dewalt
customer_reviews.text: There is not a better brand out there than dewalt. Recommend this set to anyone. I actually bought this for a gift but I have many other dewalt tools I love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt makes great power tools, and these were not a let down! The tools and the batteries work as they should
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Husband needed for remodel job
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband needed to remodel a rental house. No complaints so far from him.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Grill

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Do they come all in handy and the batteries last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat these tools, need a couple of others to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tetschner

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best set of tools I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best set of tools I've ever owned. The battery life is good but I'd recommend getting an extra set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lithium Ion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 18 volt XRP in 2001 and then when that combo unit rans its course, I bought this Lithium Ion combo. It doesn't disappoint. I built a 14' x 10' shed, with 1 charge on the battery. With my XRP's, it would've taken about 12-15 charges. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Granata

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son for his job. Fast shipping and he uses it every day
customer_reviews.author: roez

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, price was good and has pretty much everything I need for basic home maintenance/repair that require power tools
customer_reviews.author: daniel schommer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with bits and most blades
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned I wouldn't like the flashlight. It's actually pretty useful. Wish I realized that it DID NOT come with bits and sawsall blades.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Morrison

customer_reviews.title: ... but our son in law says that it is super nice and very complete
customer_reviews.text: The tool set was a Christmas gift but our son in law says that it is super nice and very complete.
customer_reviews.author: journalistjulie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Tools are nice, durable, powerfull. Batteries seem to last quite a long time. I wish they made a combo that had the cutoff tool & rotary hammer with it like the makitas. Overall for the tools this kit has they are better than the makita 18V. Wish they would expand the VMAX lineup. I want more.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Seay

customer_reviews.title: Need tools, invest here!
customer_reviews.text: This tool set is beyond worth the money, the saw zaw alone is $199 and the hammer drill is $299 retail. This is an investment you will never regret!!!
customer_reviews.author: Snarfypoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. Solid construction and long battery life. Can't find anything to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the purchase of this. This all works great impact and driver awesome the sawzall is OK bill of thing I would suggest is the batteries be bigger that would be a great
customer_reviews.author: hallmann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Perfect for my son's first home. Everything he needs to keep it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: From a Collision tech
customer_reviews.text: Ive used the 20 volt Dewalt 1/4 inch impact in my shop for almost two years now without fail. I am a collision tech and I use this tool!I remove doors, fenders, hoods, drive self tapping screws. Ive had the 1.5 batteries last up to two weeks! I also have used the sawzall and its a monster, it cuts through thick aluminum and steel like butter. The circular saw out does the makita like they are in the same quality level. I also have some of the 12V max tools, again, never had a fail and they work great. I paid over $299 for my 20v 1/4 inch impact alone. This sets worth every cent and more.
customer_reviews.author: wz rubicon

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband, he uses everyday for work. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I do Decks and Fences for a living and these work great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I hope to get the same mileage out of it as I did my makita drills, 9 yrs and they are still going. Only had to replace the batteries, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: N. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Like the tools and great service that Amazon provides, will use these everyday for my work
customer_reviews.author: Hal Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used every tool in the pack and very handy to have. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and assortment of tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and assortment of tools. Only downside is I wish the bag was just a little bigger to fit more attachments, bits, spare blades etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you will need to start up the tool bag everyone should have. My fiance is a SrMstTech for Ford and said that these are the kind of hand tools he likes to have around both at home and the shop.
customer_reviews.author: DLux

customer_reviews.title: and here is the kit my husband wanted. so ...
customer_reviews.text: and here is the kit my husband wanted. so he could use it at work.which I might add he enjoys the roduct very much.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Good value purchasing this package
customer_reviews.text: Good value purchasing this package. First time using a reciprocating saw and circular saw. Worked great! Friend of mine recommended Dewalt for its quality.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect from Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of dewalts tools and these don’t disappoint

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 4th renovation and this bag of tools is sooooo worth the money. Extremely high quality tools, I couldn't be happier with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tools by DeWalt. Batteries last longer than other companies. We definitely recommend this set of tools for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves This Set!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this set because all the batteries are interchangeable, unlike the other similar tools that he had. He has used them and is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Jonz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, fast delivery. Great product. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great price too
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my hubby he lived them!! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Twana D.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my husband along with all the other items to complete his Dewalt set. They are high quality tools. He was the envy of his buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Patti R. Pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Power tool
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine but I need the blade it didn’t come with it .... what is recommended..?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as described. All contents were in original ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. All contents were in original packaging and in a new, never opened Dewalt box. The carrying case is flimsy but I still gave it 5 stars because nobody buys these sets for the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tools in this tote-bag (SO EASY TO GRAB AND GO) are each one
customer_reviews.text: I have used DeWalt for over 30 years. The tools in this tote-bag (SO EASY TO GRAB AND GO) are each one, great. I have used the Drill to drill many holes I deck post and screws IN that same deck. The impact drill laughs at the idea of installing a 6" lag screw. I did 40 and still had power. The circle saw with left-sided blade (like a SKIL) has cut many 4x4s and deck boards. I like the quick-change SAWZ-ALL. The 20 v batteries have, from what I can determine, 1/2, again, the power and lasting than the older 18s. I would recommend this set to anyone that wishes convenience AND a good tool
customer_reviews.author: SmarterThanMyWifeThinks

customer_reviews.title: industry standard
customer_reviews.text: bought for putting up a privacy fence. The drills are absolute workhorses and the Sawsall is awesome

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good tools...... all quality products for a very good price.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt makes the best tools on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product met and exceeded my expectations. DeWalt makes the best tools on the market !!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading from the 18V XRP that always has (and still ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from the 18V XRP that always has (and still works fine). These tools are way faster and just as well made.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great except the impact burnt out on me in a couple months

customer_reviews.title: Durable and rugged
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set two years ago for my husband, to have quality tools while building our home. He was using set on daily basis during construction and now he is using set but mostly drill and torque driver for small home projects. For this review my husband told me that batteries are still like new, no change in performance, handle grip excellent and since my dad dropt drill couple of times from attic down to basement floor (during construction) with no damage to drill, he is considering this tool set as durable and rugged.

customer_reviews.text: Not much more to say. They are just what I needed and the quality you would expect from DeWalt. Great tools.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 20 volt 5 tool combo kit
customer_reviews.text: the tools themselves are no better or no worse than the 18 Volt tools.the 20 volt batteries are no better than the 18 volt batteries.I was very disappointed in the performance of the batteries.point being keep your 18's until something even better comes out.I use my tools on a daily basis professionally.I need four batteries or more to get me through a full day of use.I can't charge two, fast enough to keep working.
customer_reviews.author: 6ft.jesus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V Max Cordless Drill Combo Kit, 5-Tool (DCK590L2)
product_meta.description:
Style:Combo kitDCK590L2R 20 volt max cordless lithium-ion 5-tool combo kit.

AMAZON.COM
DEWALT’s DCK590L2 20-volt max lithium-ion 3.0 Ah five-tool combo kit includes a premium hammer drill, a 1/4-inch impact driver, a circular saw, a reciprocating saw, and a work light—a well-rounded arsenal of high-performance power tools that help everyone from carpenters and remodelers to electricians and contractors work their way through a variety of applications.



DCK590L2 20-Volt Max
Five-Tool Combo Kit
At a Glance: * Compact and ergonomic designs that don’t compromise on power
   
   
 * Five tools included: premium hammer drill, 1/4-inch impact driver, circular saw, reciprocating saw, and LED work light
   
   
 * Tools come with 3-year limited warranty, 1-year free service contract, and 90-day money-back guarantee
   
   
 * Lithium-ion batteries come with 3-year free service contract


The DCK590L2 kit includes the DCL040 LED work light. View largerHammer Drill
The 1/2-inch hammer drill’s high-power, high-efficiency motor delivers 535 unit watts out for superior performance in light and medium drilling applications. A 1/2-inch ratcheting chuck with carbide inserts provides superior bit-gripping strength—reducing slippage during high-torque applications—thus providing longer tool life. The hammer drill’s patented three-speed (0-600 RPM; 0-1,250 RPM; and 0-2,000 RPM), all-metal transmission allows users to select the appropriate speed for the job at hand and is up to 30 percent faster than current hammer drills on the market.
Impact Driver
Meanwhile, the impact driver’s robust motor delivers 2,800 RPM—up to 43 percent faster than current impact drivers on the market. Its one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts and holds 1-inch bit tips for convenient fastening in tight spaces. Research shows that impact drivers are growing in popularity largely because of their smaller size and lack of kickback (or reactionary torque) thanks to the impact mechanism within the tool. Combined with its 5.55-inch length and 3.4-pound weight, the premium impact driver packs a serious punch in a small package.

Circular Saw
The circular saw’s powerful motor (offering 460 max watts out) and ergonomic profile (with lightweight magnesium shoe and optimized handle design) are ideal for professionals tasked with framing, cross cutting, ripping, bevel cutting and plunge cutting. Delivering 3,700 RPM, this saw is 10 percent more powerful than previous DEWALT 6.5-inch cordless circular saws—and combined with its accompanying 3.0 Ah lithium-ion battery, it provides up to 57 percent more runtime compared with other leading 18-volt lithium-ion tools. Its bevel capacity of 0-50 degrees lends itself well to a variety of applications, and a 6.5-inch thin kerf carbide tooth blade provides users with the ability to cut completely through two-by framing lumber at a 45-degree bevel angle.

Reciprocating Saw
The reciprocating saw is compact and lightweight for access to tight areas (and it helps to reduce user fatigue). The keyless lever-action blade clamp makes for quick and easy blade changes, and the blade reverses for upside-down and flush cutting. Its 1-inch stroke length delivers 0-3,000 SPM for fast cutting. A variable-speed trigger with lock provides increased control, and an electric brake prevents blades from breaking with exiting plunge cuts.

LED Work Light
The work light comes equipped with additional lumens (110 total) for brighter visibility, delivering bright white LED light that reduces shadows and helps differentiate between colors. (An added bonus: The LED bulb creates less heat than conventional Xenon bulbs.) Its pivoting head rotates 120 degrees with 11 detent positions for a wide range of visibility, and the integrated hanging hook allows for hands-free capability. Users can expect up to 11 hours of light output when paired with the 3.0 Ah 20-volt max lithium-ion battery.

Endurance and Ease of Use
DEWALT-designed electronics have been built into all of these tools’ switches to provide maximum life by helping to protect them from overheating, overloading, and deep discharge during use. The max 20-volt’s lithium-ion batteries provide up to 35 percent more runtime than existing 18-volt max lithium-ion battery technology, and the included Energy Star-qualified charger has dual voltage capabilities and it is compatible with both 12-volt max and 20-volt max DEWALT lithium-ion batteries. The tools’ slim handles fit easily into users’ hands, increasing the level of comfort during the course of long jobs, and the bright built-in LED work lights above the triggers have a 20-second delay that improves visibility in dimly lit spaces.

About DEWALT's 20-Volt Max Lithium-Ion Tools
DEWALT’s line of 20-volt max lithium-ion tools features improvements in engineering and design to provide the performance, the ergonomics, and the innovation that contractors require. The new line consists of 11 tools, two lithium ion batteries, and two battery chargers, as well as a number of combo kits.

What's in the Box
One DEWALT DCK590L2 20-volt max lithium-ion 3.0 Ah five-tool combo kit, including one DCD985 premium hammer drill, one DCF885 1/4-inch impact driver, one DCS393 circular saw, one DCS381 reciprocating saw, one DCL040 LED work light, two 20-volt max 3.0 Ah lithium-ion batteries, one 12-volt max/20-volt max lithium-ion battery charger, one belt hook, one 360-degree side handle, and one contractor bag.



DEWALT's 20-volt max DCK590L2 kit also includes the line's impact driver, reciprocating saw, circular saw, and hammer drill. (Click each to enlarge)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DEWALT DCD985 20V MAX lithium ion premium 3-speed hammer drill/driver Kit (3.0 Ah) has a patented 3-speed all-metal transmission that matches the tool to task for fast application speeds and improved run time. The DCF885 1/4-inch impact driver has a compact (5.55 inches front to back), lightweight (2.8 pounds), design that fits into tight areas. It has a one-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips. This powerful little driver produces up to 3200 impacts per minute and has a max torque of 117 foot/pounds. The DCS380 reciprocating saw has a 4-position blade clamp that allows for flush cutting and increased positional versatility with tool free blade changes. The 1-1/8-inch stroke length delivers a fast cutting speed. It has a variable speed trigger with 0-3000 rpm to provide increased blade control and faster cut speeds. The DCS391 circular saw has a powerful 460 MWO, 3700 rpm motor that delivers power and speed to make the most demanding cuts with ease. It has 0-degrees-50-degrees bevel capacity to allow for aggressive bevel cuts for a multitude of applications. The 6-1/2-inch carbide tipped blade is included for cutting 2x material at 90-degrees and 45-degrees and more cuts per charge. The DCL040 LED flashlight has a bright LED output of 110 lumens. This light has an integrated hook for hands free use in multiple placements. The head rotates 120-degrees for easy flexibility allowing the user to position light at the optimal angle. This kit includes a DCD985 1/2-inch hammer drill, 360-degrees side handle, a DCF885 1/4-inch impact driver, a DCS393 6 1/2-inch circular saw, a DCS381 reciprocating saw, a DCL040 LED work light, two 20V MAX lithium ion 3.0 Ah battery packs, a fast charger, a carbide tipped blade, a belt hook, and a contractor bag.

See more
feature_bullets: Power tool type: Cordless. 20V max hammer drill with patented 3-speed all-metal transmission and 1/2-inch self-tightening chuck
20 volt max reciprocating saw with key-less blade clamp allows for quick blade change
20V max 1/4-inch impact driver features 3 LED lights with 20 second delay to provide visibility
20 volt max LED work light delivers 110 lumens of light output
20 volt max circular saw with 6-1/2-inch carbide blade can cut 2-by-4's at a 45-degrees angle
